scripts.deploy:pages: npm run build && npx wrangler pages deploy .next/static --project-name=nobinarie
scripts.deploy:pages:prod: npm run build && npx wrangler pages deploy .next/static --project-name=nobinarie --branch=main --commit-dirty=true
scripts.deploy:pages:full: npm run build && npx wrangler pages deploy .next --project-name=nobinarie
scripts.deploy:pages:full:prod: npm run build && npx wrangler pages deploy .next --project-name=nobinarie --branch=main --commit-dirty=true
